Mass.description: The mass of the object (arbitrary units). You should not make masses more or less than 100 times that of other Rigidbodies.

Drag.description: How much air resistance affects the object when moving from forces. 0 means no air resistance, and infinity makes the object stop moving immediately.

AngularDrag.description: How much air resistance affects the object when rotating from torque. 0 means no air resistance. Note that you cannot make the object stop rotating just by setting its Angular Drag to infinity.

UseGravity.description: If enabled, the object is affected by gravity.
